archimate:CommunicationNetwork.name: Sovrin Builder Network (BuilderNet)
archimate:CommunicationNetwork.documentation: A non-authoritative version of the Sovrin Ledger deployed for the purposes of testing new versions of the Sovrin Open Source Code and preparing new Stewards for activation on the Sovrin Main Network. See also Sovrin Staging Network.
